txt.en: 'To the south-east, by the foot of the mountains, camps a goblin-mob that once rode aboard Umbar's ships. The Kindred of the Coins ousted some of them, but some of the creatures linger still. Those villains are killing my sheep! I want proof that the goblins are slaughtered. Will you go to their encampment of Súlstrok and collect the goblins' bandanas so I will know the job is done?'
Return the goblin bandanas to Tagar

Tagar directs you toward a camp of goblins to the south-east of the outpost. The goblins threaten food supplies on Jax Phanâl by organizing raids against those living there.\n\nTagar wants retribution.
'So you are capable of besting goblins and saving my sheep! The magistrate did well to send you to me. I will sleep better knowing that so many of the goblins have been dealt with. Thank you.'
'You will find the little cretins in their encampment southeast of the outpost near the foot of the mountains. Go there and strike them down and return with proof of your efforts.'
The goblin encampment of Súlstrok is found to the south-east of Jax Phanâl at the foot of the mountains. Most goblins there wear bandanas. Collect the bandanas and return them to Tagar.
